name: Olfrid Battle-Born

stunts.name: Due Diligence
stunts.description: Once per scene, when Olfrid is offered a deal by a stranger, he may create the situational aspect 'Quiet Inquiry' with 1 free invoke (represents servants, records, and political channels verifying details).

stunts.name: Battle-Born Influence
stunts.description: Because Olfrid is a Whiterun powerbroker, he gains +2 to Create Advantage with Contacts when leveraging guards, merchants, or household staff in Whiterun.

notes: Olfrid is pragmatic and transactional. He will pay for results, but he expects deniability. During the Battle of Whiterun, his priority is preserving his family and his political capital.
combat_tactics: Avoids direct combat; uses guards, mercenaries, and social pressure. If cornered, he retreats behind allies and calls for help.

scene_triggers.first_meeting: Reads the PC's appearance and weapon vibe; attempts to establish dominance through pointed questions unless outmaneuvered.
scene_triggers.battle_of_whiterun: Will push for evacuation contingency and leverage any deal for future political cover.

relationships.Whiterun Guard: Influence via donations, favors, and pressure.
relationships.Thieves Guild: Useful tool if kept deniable; dangerous if sloppy.

dialogue_samples: If my name burns, your name becomes a bounty.
I don't pay for heroics. I pay for results.
You want my signature? Then you keep it clean.
